articles.title: Idli, Tandoori Chicken: Regional Cuisine For Opposition's 50-Hour Protest
articles.description: From curd rice and idli-sambhar to chicken tandoori, 'gajar ka halwa' and fruits, Opposition parties are taking turns to arrange regional cuisine for MPs on a 50-hour relay protest against their suspension and demanding discussion on price rise.
articles.content:
The MPs are holding the protest near the Gandhi statue.

articles.title: SpiceJet Ordered To Cut Flights By Half For Safety, Says Won't Affect Ops
articles.description: Budget airline SpiceJet was ordered today to operate only 50 per cent of its flights for eight weeks by the aviation regulator, in an unprecedented crackdown after an unusually high number of safety incidents involving the airline.
articles.content:
Eight incidents of flight safety were reported in a matter of 18 days.
